## LegacyOptions interface

Options for this Eleventy plugin.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface LegacyOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [audioEncodings?](./eleventy-plugin-text-to-speech.legacyoptions.audioencodings.md) |  | AudioEncoding\[\] | <p>_(Optional)_ List of encodings to use when generating audio assets from text matches.</p><p>See here for the audio encodings supported by the Speech-to-Text API: https://cloud.google.com/speech-to-text/docs/encoding\#audio-encodings</p> |
|  [cacheExpiration?](./eleventy-plugin-text-to-speech.legacyoptions.cacheexpiration.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ Expiration for the 11ty AssetCache. https://www.11ty.dev/docs/plugins/fetch/\#options |
|  [collectionName?](./eleventy-plugin-text-to-speech.legacyoptions.collectionname.md) |  | string | <p>_(Optional)_ Name of the 11ty collection created by this plugin.</p><p>Note: if you register this plugin more than once, you will need to use a different name every time (otherwise 11ty would throw an Error).</p> |
|  [keyFilename?](./eleventy-plugin-text-to-speech.legacyoptions.keyfilename.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ Absolute filepath to the service account JSON key used to authenticate the Text-to-Speech client library. These credentials might be different from the ones used to authenticate the Cloud Storage client library. If not provided, this plugin will try initializing client libraries using the GOOGLE\_APPLICATION\_CREDENTIALS environment variable. |
|  [rules](./eleventy-plugin-text-to-speech.legacyoptions.rules.md) |  | Rule\[\] | Rules that determine which texts to convert into speech. |
|  [transformName?](./eleventy-plugin-text-to-speech.legacyoptions.transformname.md) |  | string | <p>_(Optional)_ Name of the 11ty transform created by this plugin.</p><p>Note: if you register this plugin more than once, you will need to use a different name every time (11ty would NOT throw an Error, but this plugin will not work as expected).</p> |
|  [voice?](./eleventy-plugin-text-to-speech.legacyoptions.voice.md) |  | string | <p>_(Optional)_ Voice to use when generating audio assets from text matches.</p><p>See here for the voices supported by the Speech-to-Text API: https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/voices</p><p>Note: different voices might have different prices: https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/pricing</p> |
